name: Gamification
text: Sounded interesting in terms of concept, but the course wasn't very. Got still quite far, but didn't complete it.

name: Your Body in the World: Adapting to Your Next Big Adventure
text: A light and sweet course about Human Physiology. A guy tries getting cold, warm, high up, etc.

name: Personal & Family Financial Planning
text: Worked through a quarter of the course. Got some practice and thinking about personal finances.
